commit.title: Fix-up comments on the SMPP error code constants
DefaultSmppServer should use IO executor passed to its constructor
Updated value of DATA_CODING_GSM constant and made it deprecated
Corrected name of DataCoding SmppConstant to IA5 (not GSM)
Allowing unbound channel to respond to enquire_link PDU
add support for missing pdu's and tags
#89 DeliveryReceipt, err:null error, fix the timezone issue.
Add code to send a delivery receipt when an MT is received
Update path to examples in README
Add 'persist-client' to Makefile and document it in README
Adding implementation of equals and hashCode in Tlv.
Adding tests for equals and hash code.

when reconnection is in progress: SessionHandler can receive ChannelUnexpectedlyClosed in a different thread, reconnecting thread itself fails on  "com.cloudhopper.smpp.type.SmppChannelException: Channel was closed after sending request, but before receiving response"
#scheduleWithFixedDelay behaves better when enquire link timeouts
ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor is not flexible enough, we must use two Executors in ReconnectionDaemon
Fixed spelling of received in contributed code
Dependencies now use specific versions rather than version ranges
Delivery receipt intermediate flag is bit 4 not 5
Bumped version to re-run release plugin
Added support for a writeTimeout to channel writes.
Added support for a writeTimeout to channel writes.
introduced the #rawErrorCode to allow for the String representation as well as maintaining backward compatibility
validation that all unit tests are passing
fix for encoding submit_sm_resp messages with no message_id
Added sample configuration for testing interoperability with stunnel encryption wrapped server.
added some delays after session.close() to a test that was intermittently failing.

Added integration demo (QueryCancelMain) for use of query_sm and cancel_sm commands. This was testsed against the SMPPSim simulator <http://www.seleniumsoftware.com/user-guide.htm>, and successfully queries the sent message state and cancels its delivery.
Added unit tests for query_sm, query_sm_resp, cancel_sm and cancel_sm_resp
Added support for both cancel_sm and response and query_sm and response.
Refactor to upgrade parent maven POM
Added OSGI support for final binary jar
Fixed bug with encoding and decoding for DataSM
Added unit tests for deliver_sm parsing issues with 2 different SMSC vendors
Add validation of short messages greater than 255 bytes in length; added version class
Added safety dereference for session handler on destroy
Added counting of avg window size and estimated processing time
Updated notes and normalized destroy() naming convention
Added initial JMX support with both an SmppServerMXBean and SmppSessionMXBean
Switched demo server to NIO sockets
Removed test of OIO client socket
Added both session and server counters; added performance testing client demo
Large cleanup of javadocs and comments; added full apache license
Large cleanup of javadocs and comments; added full apache license
Integrated new monitor for auto expiring requests in client
Initial refactoring with new ch-commons-util package
Intermediate changes for some of ch-commons-util changes
Initial work on new SmppFuture impl
Fixed peformance issue with a relatively high number of SmppServer sessions
Fixed inability to pass underlying cause of a bind failure up chain to properly throw an SmppChannelException
Updated README and removed some debug logging from DeliveryReceipt parser
Initial export of svn repo for public release
